compliance.description: After the trial period, enable the following settings to ensure compliance:
compliance.enforceDigitalSignaturesTooltip: Only users with a verified digital signature can enter content into documents.
compliance.enforceUserRestrictionsTooltip: Inactive users will no longer be able to log in.
compliance.ersdDefaultText:
Electronic Signature and Record Disclosure.

By using the Docufen application, you agree to the following terms:

You understand that your electronic signature within this system is legally binding and equivalent to your handwritten signature.

You accept full responsibility for all actions initiated under your electronic signature.

You agree to:
	•	Keep your login credentials confidential
	•	Not share your account or allow others to use your electronic signature
	•	Immediately report any suspected unauthorized use of your account or electronic signature
	•	You acknowledge that all records and signatures created using this system are subject to audit and inspection by regulatory authorities.
	•	You understand that falsification of electronic records or signatures is a serious offense that may result in disciplinary action, termination of employment, and/or legal consequences.
	•	You agree to comply with all company policies and procedures related to the use of electronic records and signatures.
	•	You consent to the use of electronic records and signatures for all documents processed through this system.
	•	By clicking "I Agree," you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms of this disclosure.

ersdModal.byClickingIAgree: By clicking "I Agree," you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms of this disclosure.
ersdModal.couldNotSaveAgreement: Could not save your agreement. Please try again.
ersdModal.modalDescription: This is the disclosure users must accept before accessing the application.

compliance.ersdTooltip: Users must accept the Electronic Record and Signature Disclosure before accessing electronic records and using electronic signatures.
compliance.title: Compliance

tableCellInsertion.description: Allow users the option to insert text exactly where their cursor is placed, instead of appending entries in a new paragraph.

tooltip.disabled: When disabled: All entries automatically append as a new paragraph.
tooltip.enabled:
When enabled: Users can toggle between two insertion modes:

• Insert at cursor - Text appears exactly where the cursor is placed

• Append - Text is added as a new paragraph

actions.confirmReopen: Are you sure you want to re‑open this document? This will allow you to make further changes. The final PDF will no longer be the current version. Please remember to update records in any other GxP digital system you use in conjunction with Docufen.

addStickENoteSubtitle: Just as you would stick a Post-it to remind your colleagues to sign at specific spots or to make particular updates, you can use the Stick-e Note in a similar fashion. Once you have added a Stick-e-Note, use the @ feature to tag people and assign them tasks. These are non-GxP notes only, do not enter results using these notes.

costAnalysis.calculatePaperCostDescription: To see your potential ROI and savings with Docufen, you need to calculate your current cost per paper page. This includes all costs associated with paper documentation - printing, storage, labor, and compliance.
costAnalysis.enterEstimatedMonthlyUsageDescription: Enter your estimated monthly page usage to calculate a more accurate break-even timeline. This helps you plan based on projected growth rather than just current usage.
costAnalysis.enterImplementationCosts: Enter your total implementation and setup costs for Docufen.
costAnalysis.enterImplementationInvestmentDescription: Enter your total investment for implementing Docufen, including setup costs, training, integration, and any professional services.
costAnalysis.includeCostsHint: Include all costs: printing, paper, storage, labor, retrieval, compliance, etc.
costAnalysis.includeInvestmentHint: Include: software licenses, hardware, setup fees, training costs, integration expenses, etc.
costAnalysis.investmentCostTooltip: Enter the total cost of implementing the digital system, including consulting fees, software, and internal resources. This figure is used to calculate your break-even point.
costAnalysis.newDigitalCostTooltip: Your per-page cost using the digital system, typically lower than paper. This adjusts dynamically based on your usage. The chip shows your current monthly volume.
costAnalysis.oldPaperCostTooltip: This value represents how much you're currently spending per page on paper documents. Calculating this helps you see your potential savings when switching to digital.
costAnalysis.pricePerPage: Price per page based on Docufen tiers
costAnalysis.pricesInEUR: Estimated EUR prices ({{rate}} EUR/USD, frankfurter.app). Billing in USD.
costAnalysis.savingsPercentageTooltip: Your savings percentage is calculated based on your current page usage, giving you a transparent view of your actual savings.
costAnalysis.setRealTimeROI: Set your real time ROI insights by calculating your paper page costs.
costAnalysis.threeYearROITooltip: Shows your projected return over three years, based on your estimated monthly usage. Adjust your estimates to keep this calculation accurate and meaningful.
costAnalysis.timeToBreakEvenTooltip: Calculated using your estimated monthly pages and investment cost, this shows how many months of savings it takes to recover your investment.

billing.pageCountByType: Page count by document type over time
billing.title: Billing and ROI

connectors.method1Description: Send files directly using multipart/form-data. This is the simplest approach and recommended for most integrations.
connectors.method2Description: Encode the .docx file as Base64 and send it in a JSON payload. Useful when multipart uploads are not supported.

digitalSignature.imageUploadDesc: Upload an image of the user's verified signature from an existing physical signature register or company form.
digitalSignature.invalidFileType: Please upload JPG, PNG, or PDF files only
digitalSignature.invitedUserCannotVerify: Digital signature verification cannot be completed until the invited user signs in. Please ask the user to sign in to the application first.
digitalSignature.microsoftConfirmation: By selecting this option, you confirm that this Microsoft ID has been verified in another validated system within your organization and can be used to establish signature traceability per 21 CFR Part 11 requirements.
digitalSignature.microsoftVerificationConfirm: By selecting this option, you confirm that this Microsoft ID has been verified in another validated system within your organization and can be used to establish signature traceability per 21 CFR Part 11 requirements.
digitalSignature.microsoftVerificationDesc: Confirm this user's Microsoft ID is already linked to their signature register entry in another validated system within your organization.
digitalSignature.noFileSelected: Please select a file to upload
digitalSignature.notationPlaceholder: Enter signature register ID or reference
digitalSignature.registerNotationDesc: Enter an existing ID from the user's physical or digital signature register to establish a cross-reference between this system and your existing signature verification records.
digitalSignature.verificationDesc: Per 21 CFR Part 11 and EU GMP Annex 11, digital signatures must be traceable to an individual's verified identity. Please select a verification method to establish this required traceability.

docufenAccessDeniedContent: The current user does not have enough permissions to access the file properties. If you are an external user and someone has shared this document with you, ask to be invited as an external member.
docufenNeedsCookies: Docufen needs cookies to manage your session. Please allow third-party cookies for *.sharepoint.com.
documentAlteredMessage: If you believe this not to be the case please contact support@docufen.com

documentHasNotYetBeenApp: Document has not yet been approved by Quality.
documentIsStillLockedTheOtherUser: Document is still locked. The other user is still editing.
documentMovedContent: The GxP document must not be moved from its location on Sharepoint. Click the "{{open}}" button to browse the correct Sharepoint folder.

documentStatusModal.updatedText: The document content has been refreshed and is up to date. Please review the Audit Log to check for any changes made by other users before making changes.
documentStatusModal.updatingText: The document is currently being updated.

org.title: Select Organization

part11Compliant: All data entries and signatures are in compliance with 21 CFR Part 11.

participants.accessDescription: Control which users have access to this document.
participants.addOwnersDescription: Add users who can manage this document.
participants.addViewersDescription: Add users who can view this document.
participants.allPostApprovalSignaturesRequired: All participants in Post-Approval must sign before proceeding to Close.
participants.allSignaturesRequired: All participants in Pre-Approval must sign before proceeding to Execution.

roleDescriptions.approvers: Can add signatures in the pre-approval and post-approval stages.
roleDescriptions.contributors: Add content during execution — text, attachments, and execution signatures.
roleDescriptions.executors: Add participants that need to enter text, attachments or execution signatures.
roleDescriptions.owners: Responsible for the document. Can invite users and manage all stages.
roleDescriptions.postApprovers: Add participants that need to enter Post-Approval signatures.
roleDescriptions.preApprovers: Add participants that need to enter Pre-Approval signatures.

participants.searchForAUser: Search for a user to add as {{ whoToAdd }}
participants.searchForUser: Search for a user to add as
participants.searchUsers: Search users by name or email...
participants.title: Participants

participants-will-be-notified-by-email: Participants will be notified by email.

placeholders.enterVoidReason: Please explain why you're voiding this document

please-finish-editing-the-workflow-befor: Please finish editing the workflow before continuing to work with the document.
please-provide-a-reason-for-returning-to: Please provide a reason for returning to the previous stage:
pleaseEnsureYouHavePermission: Please ensure that you have the required permissions to edit this document.
pleaseSave: Please save the word document to give it a filename.
postitNotesRemaining_one: There is {{count}} non-GxP note (Post-it note) remaining.
postitNotesRemaining_other: There are {{count}} non-GxP notes (Post-it notes) remaining.
preApprovalContentLockedContent: Users can only edit content that has been entered by a user. This text is in dark blue. Black and faint blue text cannot be edited. If you need to make changes, please contact someone from the Docufen Quality Approvers group to make the necessary changes.

progress.possibleDelay: The document may take some time to prepare.

return-to-execution-add-content: Return to Execution? Add content or make corrections. Note: All Post-Approval signatures will need to be collected again to ensure review of changes.
return-to-pre-approval-only-for-adding-s: Return to Pre-Approval? Only for adding signatures or re-signing. Need to edit content? Stay in Execution and use the Cell Editor.
returnedToExecute_one: Returned to Execute and removed one signature
returnedToExecute_other: Returned to Execute and removed {{count}} signatures
returnedToExecute_zero: Returned to Execute and removed no signatures
select-a-stage-and-add-participants-to-t: Select a stage and add participants to the workflow.
selectOneOrMore: Select One or More Table Cells
selectOneOrMoreContent: Select cells or rows of cells to be inserted with N/A, selecting columns is not supported.
selectionEmptyContent: Please select the text you want to replace.

selectionHandler.checkboxInstructions: Double click or select a ballot box then click the checkbox button below:

errors.emptyTextOrReason: Cannot make correction: New text or reason is empty

selectionHandler.helpText: Select some text in the document to correct it.

placeholders.newContent: Leave blank, or type replacement text...

setupWizard.accountSetupDesc: Enter your company information to set up your account.
setupWizard.creatingStorage: Creating Azure Blob Storage container for data isolation
setupWizard.settingUpDatabase: Setting up Microsoft Cosmos DB Database
setupWizard.title: Setup Wizard
setupWizard.trialActivatedDesc: Your 14-day trial has been activated. You can now start using Docufen.
setupWizard.trialDesc: Activate your 14-day trial to start using Docufen.
setupWizard.userManagerDesc: Dear Administrator, While you oversee the entire system and will have access to deactivate all users, a User Manager with GxP expertise is needed to verify digital signatures and maintain regulatory compliance when adding document users. Please add at least one User Manager to begin creating compliant digital documentation.

sideload: Please sideload your addin to see app body.
signedERSDDetails: User signed the ERSD (Electronic Record Signature Declaration) form.
somebodyElseIs: Somebody else is currently using the document. Please try again in a few seconds.

stageGoBack.auditLogNotice: This reason will be recorded in the audit log for compliance tracking.
stageGoBack.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to move this document from {{from}} back to {{to}}? This action will require a reason and will be logged in the audit trail.
stageGoBack.reasonLabel: Reason for going back to previous stage
stageGoBack.reasonPlaceholder: Please provide a detailed reason for moving back to the previous stage...

startMessage: To complete this document with Docufen, copy it to the GxP Library.

support.description: Submit a support ticket or view your existing tickets

errors.apiNotAvailable: Support ticket API endpoint not available. Please contact your administrator.
errors.createFailed: Failed to create support ticket. Please try again.
errors.loadTicketDetailFailed: Failed to load ticket details. Please try again.
errors.loadTicketsFailed: Failed to load support tickets. Please try again.
errors.notAuthenticated: You must be logged in to submit a support ticket
errors.onlyOneFileAllowed: Only one file can be attached
errors.replyFailed: Failed to send reply. Please try again.

fields.clickOrDrag: Click to upload or drag and drop
fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide detailed information about your issue

success.ticketCreated: Your support ticket has been created successfully!

support.title: Support

the-operation-is-taking-longer-than-expe: Operation is taking longer than expected
theDocumentWillBeReadyShortly: The document will be ready shortly.
this-dialog-allows-editing-user-informat: This dialog allows editing user information, including name, initials, email, and permissions.
this-document-has-been-voided-and-is-no-: This document has been voided and is no longer valid for processing.
thisDocumentIsManaged: This document is managed by Docufen. If the Docufen Add-in does not open automatically, you may need to install it first. You can find instructions on how to install the add-in by clicking on the following link: {{installationInstructions}}
thisFilenameMustBe: This filename must be: "{{filename}}" and it must be located in the correct sharepoint folder. Click the "Open" button to open the correct Sharepoint folder.
thisIsACopyOf: This is a copy of the <webUrl>original document</webUrl>.
thisIsACopy_: This is a copy of the <1 href="{{webUrl}}">original document</1>.
timestampedContent: The content added during the execution stage is timestamped. Docufen has notarised all such entries within the document's Audit Log to ensure integrity and traceability.
toInsertContent: To insert content into the document, please click in a table cell.
toSignDocument: To sign the document, please click in the table cell you want to sign.

toast.anErrorOccurredWhileCreatingTheControlle: An error occurred while creating the controlled copy

toggleCellColourContent: This function gives you the ability to manually control the background colour of table cells in your Word document. Simply select any cell and click the button to toggle its colour between green and white as needed.
trueCopyDescription: For attachments that need 1 or 2 verifications
trueCopyInfo: If your attachment is a True Copy and requires 1 or 2 person verification you can use the Verify buttons below to verify that the document is an accurate and complete representation of the original.

tt.clickToAddDate: Click to add today's date to a cell
tt.clickToAddFail: Click to add "Fail" to a cell
tt.clickToAddInitials: Click to add "{{initials}}" to a cell
tt.clickToAddNa: Click to add "N/A" to a cell
tt.clickToAddNo: Click to add "No" to a cell
tt.clickToAddPass: Click to add "Pass" to a cell
tt.clickToAddTime: Click to add the current time to a cell
tt.clickToAddYes: Click to add "Yes" to a cell
tt.clickToSign: Click in the table cell you want to sign, select a role and click {{buttonTitle}}.
tt.finaliseAsPdf: Click to finalise the document with attachments in a signed pdf file. This action is irreversible.
tt.selectDocType: Select the type of GxP document and then click {{buttonTitle}}

typeTextHere:
Type text here...
Multiple paragraphs supported
unableToLockMessage: Docufen is unable to lock the contents of this document, likely due to features unsupported by Word Online. Please first save the document in Word 97 format and then convert it back to a .docx file to remove these features. If the issue persists after this process, please contact Docufen support for further assistance.
uninvitedUserDetails: Uninvited user before they logged in.
uploadFailedContent: Ask for the document folder to be shared with you.
useLatestVersion: This Addin works best with the latest verion of Office. Please ensure you have installed all the updates.

userManager.dearAdministratorWhileYouOverseeThe: Dear Administrator, While you oversee the entire system and will have access to deactivate all users, a User Manager with GxP expertise is needed to verify digital signatures and maintain regulatory compliance when adding document users. Please add at least one User Manager to begin creating compliant digital documentation.
userManager.sameEmailDetectedThisApplicationReq: Same email detected: This application requires at least two separate users. The User Manager must be different from the Administrator. Please enter another email address.

userNotConfiguredContent: Please ensure that the following Azure AD user properties are set: "Display name",  "Email", "Job title" and "Company". Your admin can set these in the Azure AD portal.

users.addNewUserDescription: Add a new user to your organization.
users.companyAutoDetected: Company will be automatically detected by the system
users.deleteConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to deactivate this user? This will set their status to Inactive.
users.digitalSignatureVerificationDesc: Per 21 CFR Part 11 and EU GMP Annex 11, digital signatures must be traceable to an individual's verified identity. Please select a verification method to establish this required traceability.
users.digitalUuidDescription: Enable this to link the user's signature to the digital signature register
users.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop a signature image or click to browse
users.enterSignatureRegisterId: Enter signature register ID or reference
users.imageUploadDesc: Upload an image of the user's verified signature from an existing physical signature register or company form.
users.microsoftConfirmation: By selecting this option, you confirm that this Microsoft ID has been verified in another validated system within your organization and can be used to establish signature traceability per 21 CFR Part 11 requirements.
users.microsoftIdVerificationDesc: Confirm this user's Microsoft ID is already linked to their signature register entry in another validated system within your organization.
users.microsoftLoginText: Please sign in with your Microsoft account to approve this user's signature register.
users.name: Name
users.registerNotationDesc: Enter an existing ID from the user's physical or digital signature register to establish a cross-reference between this system and your existing signature verification records.
users.title: User Management
users.waitingForSignIn: Waiting for user to sign in

validation.sameEmail: User manager cannot be the same person as the administrator

verifiedDigitalSignatureDetails: User's digital signature has been verified using the "{{ newData }}" method.
verifyContent: I hereby certify that I have reviewed both the original record and its digital copy, and confirm that the attached digital copy is an accurate and complete representation of the original record.
voidingPostApprovalSignatures: All Post-Approval Signatures will be struckthrough and the document will return to the Execution step. Click ok to go back to Execute and then re-sign this document.
voidingPreApprovalSignatures: All Pre-Approval Signatures will be deleted and the document will be unlocked to allow drafting and modifications. Click ok to go back to draft and then re-sign this document.

welcomeList.part1: Complete any GxP Document in Word
welcomeList.part3: Execute and fill out table cells with traceability

wrongUserContent: You cannot sign as someone else. You can switch users or go back and sign as yourself.
your-browser-doesnt-support-pdf-embeddin: Your browser doesn't support PDF embedding.
